jobDescription:
As a Backend Engineer (Php), you will be responsible for designing and implementing efficient and scalable systems, building and maintaining our core services, and collaborating with cross functional teams.


Responsibilites:


  • Design and implement backend services using Php and related technologies
  • Write clean, maintainable, efficient and scalable code
  • Collaborate with other team memebers to identify and solve complex problems
  • Participate in code reviews and ensure adherence to development best practices
  • Contribute to the development of our technical roadmap and architecture


Requirements


  • fluency or understanding of Php programming
  • Understanding of database systems (RDBMS or NOSQL)
  • Can use Docker and Kubernetes for application development and deployment
  • Self driven to solve problems
  • Good communication, teamwork, inter-team collaboration


Good to have


  • Experinece in Php projects development
  • Database system development experiecne
  • Knowledge of Unix/Linux environment
  • Can adapt to fast-paced coding and sprints


Language Requirements


  • Can work in Chinese or Japanese or English
  • Can read and understand techincal document in English
aboutCompany: By introducing a unique way of transferring money, we could witness bringing millions of people in Myanmar access to formal financial services. By November 2020, the number of Wave Money shops grew over 65,000 located across in 300 townships nationwide, approximately covering 89% of the country. In mid-2020, we officially launched WavePay, our mobile wallet application, bringing the digital solution for our customers that they can use with their mobile phones anytime, anywhere.

aboutCompany: Twitch is an American video live streaming service that focuses on video game live streaming, including broadcasts of e-sports competition, in addition to offering music broadcasts, creative content and real life stream.

jobDescription:
What you'll bring


Required:


  • 3+ years of software engineering experience with a Bachelor's degree.
  • 2+ years of experience with React front-end and Node js back-end.
  • Product and web design experience.
  • Experience with cloud services.
  • Experience with node js, express and rest api.
  • Ability to write testable, scalable and efficient code.
  • Excellent interpersonal communicatioon skills, team collaboration and organizational skills.
  • Highly adaptive, self-starter, creatuve problem solver.
  • Fluency in English, both spoken and written


Preferred: 


  • Experience with wireframe tools.
  • Understanding of Web3 and Ethereum.
  • Experience with Firebase/Google Cloud Platform


What you'll do


We're hiring a full-time web developer to join our software engineering team.As an engineer , you will be working with our team on continuing develop our website's front-end and back-end.We'd also like you to have a knack of design and experience with UI/UX.You should alos to effectively communicate and work well with the team regarding web development.


Our team communication in English, but knowing japanese is a plus.We prefer you to be living in Japan. But are open to international applicants and will assist with a japanese work visa sponsorship and travel.


Benefits


  • Competitive salary package
  • Social insurance
  • Work-related expenses
  • Creative, collaborative and supportive work environment
  • Flexible work hours/arrangements
aboutCompany: Facebook was founded in 2004 by Mark Zuckerberg, Eduardo Saverin, Dustin Moskovitz, and Chris Hughes, all of whom were students at Harvard University. Facebook became the largest social network in the world, with nearly three billion users as of 2021, and about half that number were using Facebook every day

jobDescription:
What you'll bring

  • 3+ years of software engineering experience with a Bachelor's degree.

  • Experience with node js, express and rest api.

  • Flexible work hours/arrangements

  • 3+ years of software engineering experience with a Bachelor's degree.

  • Experience with node js, express and rest api.
  • Ability to write testable, scalable and efficient code.
  • Excellent interpersonal communicatioon skills, team collaboration and organizational skills.
  • Highly adaptive, self-starter, creatuve problem solver.
  • Fluency in English, both spoken and written


Preferred: 


  • Experience with wireframe tools.
  • Understanding of Web3 and Ethereum.
  • Experience with Firebase/Google Cloud Platform


What you'll do


We're hiring a full-time web developer to join our software engineering team.As an engineer , you will be working with our team on continuing develop our website's front-end and back-end.We'd also like you to have a knack of design and experience with UI/UX.You should alos to effectively communicate and work well with the team regarding web development.


Our team communication in English, but knowing japanese is a plus.We prefer you to be living in Japan. But are open to international applicants and will assist with a japanese work visa sponsorship and travel.

  • Competitive salary package

  • Work-related expenses
  • Creative, collaborative and supportive work environment
